title: Samsung reveals Galaxy S22 series pricing and pre-order info for India
content:
Samsung India has finally shared the pricing details for the company’s latest flagship smartphone lineup, the Galaxy S22 series. If you’re thinking of getting your hands on one of the new Galaxy devices, you’ll have to wait some more, as pre-orders begin from February 23, 2022. Samsung India has not revealed anything apart from the

The post Samsung reveals Galaxy S22 series pricing and pre-order info for India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has revealed the Galaxy S22 series pricing and pre-order details for India. However, sales information has not been shared.
